name: Messier92 Car Driving Game - Exploration/Learning only
name_original: Messier92 Car Driving Game - Exploration/Learning only
description:
Features explored when making this game:
1. Switching between scenes and canvases
2. Car/driving physics
3. User Interface - Buttons and Sliders
4. Creating a custom UI widget - Speedometer
5. Audio and playlist features
6. Cinemachine camera
7.  Custom-created roads using Blendr
8.  Lighting and particle systems
9. Passing and obtaining data from scripts and GameObjects
10. Uploading a game
11. SECRET FEATURE (tobeimplemented end-Feb 2021)
